ComicInfo.Summary: With his latest scheme at pollution, Dr. Killemoff has struck a deal with a local food factory. By injecting a synthetic egg substitute into their products, he looks to turn a profit at the cost of the consumer's health. Accidentally inserting a pre-conscious enzyme into the mixture, the final result is a sentient monster! The giant disrupts Tromaville, and the Toxic Crusaders must find a way to save their town.
ComicInfo.Tags: Czar Zoster,Psycho,Toxic Crusaders,Tromaville,New Jersey,Radiation Rangers,Yvonne,Junkyard,Headbanger,Bonehead,Dr. Killemoff,NOZone,Toxic Avenger,Major Disaster,Island City,Mrs. Junko
ComicInfo.Title: Night Of The Living Dessert
